name: Aspire
description: In working to escape a deep cave, a fallen kingdom is open for exploration and exploitation. Numerous upgrades can be found throughout the world of Aspire to aid in exploration, including bird bouncing, teleportation, flight, and so on. With these upgrades, explore and fight through this Metroidvania to gain access to numerous areas, including a mossy forest, a lava chasm, a dark tomb, a royal kingdom, and more!
